thread.section_title: CheapOair.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.com | www.cheapoair.com | 5 of 243
thread.title: Daniel Garcia

author: Daniel Garcia
title: Daniel Garcia
text: After booking the fight I noticed the departure date needed to be Thursday not Friday. I called your customer service right away but they were not able to change the date with out a fee. I looked back and checked on the price and it would have been cheaper to departure on the date I wanted. Should have tripled check before buying the ticket. What gets to me is that I always book with cheapoair and the one time I need a break they can't help me.
